ygData.subject: Tishan's Clash
ygData.msgSnippet: Good tips everyone!  I tried using Tishan s Clash as recommended by some of the posts here and I must say that it DOES work pretty well in a group situation.
ygData.messageBody:
Good tips everyone! I tried using Tishan's Clash as recommended by some of
the posts here and I must say that it DOES work pretty well in a group
situation. It's a nice spell to start a fight off with as it's small enough
damage as not to attract attention from the MoB, yet it gives enough stun
time for the tanks to do their work. I've noticed that it's pretty safe
casting my big spell right after recovery from casting TC....I have yet to
test all the situations. I've alternated TC & nuke spells on the MoBs to
good results.

Nice to know this Wizard list is actually providing good information again!
:)

-- Lim'Dul

Message: 14
Date: Tue, 29 Jun 1999 09:03:12 +0200
From: Wizard <wizard@...>
Subject: Re: Tishan's Clash - BONE CRUSHING tactic

>Great post i used it tactics when camping a bone crusher in najena he deal
>a fair amount of damage and first two pops he nearly get us killed. Until i
>got on with strategy involving a titan clash. I was in group with a shaman
>but i think this tactic can be used with any orher armored caster.(cleric,
shaman, druid).
